title: Object Oriented Systems in R
description: A short description of the post.
contents:
Description
This is a talk/workshop summarizing three different object oriented programming systems in R: S3, S4, and R6. It is meant for intermediate R Programmers.
This talk contains two notebooks explaining S4 and R6 that can be found at the repository link below.

title: System Science and Data Science
description: How are System Science and Data Science connected?
